meta.title: Glare Free Light — Lighting design without glare
meta.description: Interior, facade and landscape lighting. High visual comfort, precise optics, and discreet integration.

hero.title: Light changes everything.
hero.subtitle: We design lighting for interiors, facades and landscapes. Well-designed light changes how a space is perceived - we’ve been doing this for 15 years.

about.title: Specialists in light without unwanted glare
paragraphs: We work with architects, designers and end clients across Portugal and EMEA. From concept to delivery we ensure proper photometry and discreet integration.
Over a decade designing and executing luxury lighting projects — museums, facades and private interiors.
